text: The Numbers Start with the River is a 1971 American short documentary film about smalltown life in Iowa. Produced by Donald Wrye for the United States Information Agency, it was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1971 films Category:1971 short films Category:1971 documentary films Category:American films Category:American independent films Category:American documentary films Category:English-language films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about the United States Category:Rural society in the United States Category:Films directed by Donald Wrye Category:United States Information Agency films
title: The Numbers Start with the River
